paragraph.paragraph:
A ../../reference/controls/wel_group_box_chart.xmlWEL_GROUP_BOX is used to enclose other controls, and certain controls such as a
/libraries/wel/content/controls/wel_radio_button.xml WEL_RADIO_BUTTON have special behaviour when parented in a ../../reference/controls/wel_group_box_chart.xmlWEL_GROUP_BOX.
paragraph.heading: 2Appearance
